name: MacOS - Load Kernel Module via kextload and kmutil
description: This test uses the kextload and kmutil commands to load and unload a MacOS kernel module.

steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: The kernel module must exist on disk at specified location

data.command: if [ -d #{module_path} ] ; then exit 0; else exit 1 ; fi

steps.name: Resolve dependency 1/1
steps.description: The kernel module must exist on disk at specified location

steps.name: Re-check dependency 1/1
steps.description: The kernel module must exist on disk at specified location

data.command: if [ -d #{module_path} ] ; then exit 0; else exit 1 ; fi

input_arguments.name: module_path
input_arguments.description: Folder used to store the module.
